com.foreach.across.modules.web.servlet

Class AcrossWebDynamicServletConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.web.servlet.AcrossWebDynamicServletConfigurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletContextInitializer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipartResolverConfiguration
    Deprecated. 
    in favour of FilterRegistrationBean or ServletRegistrationBean

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AcrossWebDynamicServletConfigurer
extends Object
implements org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletContextInitializer
    Base configurer class that can be used to dynamically extend a ServletContext. Works by checking if the AbstractAcrossServletInitializer was used to bootstrap the context.

    Since 2.0.0 the use of ServletContextInitializer beans directly inside modules is also supported and preferred.

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    AbstractAcrossServletInitializer, ServletContextInitializer

      • onStartup

        public final void onStartup(ServletContext servletContext)

      • configure

        public final void configure(ServletContext servletContext,
                            boolean servletContextIsExtensible)
                     throws ServletException
        Deprecated. 
        Apply the configuration to the ServletContext provided. Will dispatch to either dynamicConfigurationAllowed(ServletContext) or dynamicConfigurationDenied(ServletContext) depending on the changeable state of the ServletContext itself.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - in which to register the servlets (if possible)
        servletContextIsExtensible - true if the context can still have filters or servlets registered
        Throws:
        ServletException - if an error occurs

      • dynamicConfigurationAllowed

        protected abstract void dynamicConfigurationAllowed(ServletContext servletContext)
                                             throws ServletException
        Deprecated. 
        Called when the ServletContext initialization is still busy and dynamic extension should be possible.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - ServletContext that is being initialized.
        Throws:
        ServletException

      • dynamicConfigurationDenied

        protected abstract void dynamicConfigurationDenied(ServletContext servletContext)
                                            throws ServletException
        Deprecated. 
        Called when the ServletContext does not allow dynamic extension. Probably because the ApplicationContext was not started using an AbstractAcrossServletInitializer.

        Usually means this configurer can not do its part and some feedback should be presented to the user.

        Parameters:
        servletContext - ServletContext that already is initialized.
        Throws:
        ServletException
